channel.title: Grounded
channel.description: Join us as Pastor Matt Round gives important answers to difficult biblical questions.In the Grounded podcast, Pastor Matt Round will give important answers to challenging biblical questions and concepts while staying grounded in the truth of God's Word.
channel.author: groundedwithmattround@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 1 - Introduction (Part 2)

item.description: Today we continue the interview with Pastor Matt Round that we started last episode.

item.title: Episode 1 - Introduction (Part 1)
